name: Horizon Agent - Tenant ABC
description: Provides information about orders and inventory for a specific tenant.

skills.name: Get Order Status
skills.description: Retrieves the status of a specific order.
examples: what is the status of order 123?

name: Horizon Agent - Tenant XYZ
description: Provides information about orders and inventory for a specific tenant.

skills.name: Get Order Status
skills.description: Retrieves the status of a specific order.
examples: what is the status of order 123?

skills.name: Get Weather
skills.description: Provides the weather forecast for a given city.
examples: what is the weather in London?

skills.name: Check Availability
skills.description: Checks a user's availability for a time using their Google Calendar.
examples: Am I free from 10am to 11am tomorrow?

skills.name: Search airbnb accommodation
skills.description: Helps with accommodation search using airbnb
examples: Please find a room in LA, CA, April 15, 2025, checkout date is april 18, 2 adults
